amendment.description: To ensure that a prescription drug benefit is available to all medicare beneficiaries on an equal basis, including those who choose to remain in the current fee-for-service program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 348 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 82.

action.text: Amendment SA 348 proposed by Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S4336; text: CR S4336) To ensure that a prescription drug benefit is available to all medicare beneficiaries on an equal basis, including those who choose to remain in the current fee-for-service program.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 348 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 82.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 348 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 82.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 348 proposed by Senator Baucus.
